features: Complete Titanium Finish Knife Set - Set your kitchen up for success with our 16-piece knife set. This extensive collection includes all the essentials you need and more. These knife blades have a titanium finish that offers superior corrosion and temperature resistance.

Premium Wooden Block with Built-in Sharpener - Keep your knives organized and sharp with our premium wooden stand. This stylish stand features a built-in sharpener for easy maintenance. The set also includes kitchen gadgets for added versatility.

Masterful Precision - Slice, cut, and chop like a pro with our high-quality knives. The 8.3 inch chef knife and 7 inch Santoku knife offer unmatched precision and control. Upgrade your culinary skills with these apartment must haves for the kitchen.

Ergonomic Excellence - Effortlessly handle any cutting task with our ergonomic knife set. Our kitchen knife set all provide comfort and precision. Simplify meal preps with Home Hero's apartment essentials.

Perfect Gift Home Cooks - Looking for home essentials to gift? Our 16-piece knife set. is the ideal housewarming gift! for new homes This set includes all the essential tools for any kitchen. From razor-sharp steak knives to a pair of scissors.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The Complete Kitchen Knife Set For Tackling Every Cooking Challenge Introducing the Home Hero 16 Pc Knife Set with Wooden Block – your ticket to precise, clean cuts and the ultimate sharpness. Glide through meal prep effortlessly and cut through food like butter with this complete set of razor-sharp titanium-finish knives.

Previous page Master Any Cut Precision at Your Fingertips The ultimate culinary companion for versatile cutting, dicing, slicing, and chopping. Ultra-Sharp Edge The Perfect Slice, Every Time Experience the art of fine slicing. Create professional-looking dishes with razor-sharp precision. Carve with Confidence Precision Carving Made Easy Thinly slice through roasts and hams, and large cuts of meat for impressive presentation. Bakery-Quality Slices The Perfect Cut for Every Loaf The serrated blade cuts through bread, bagels, and pastries without crushing or tearing. Next page 1 8.3 inches Chef Knife 2 7 inches Santoku Knife 3 8.1 inches Slicing Knife 4 8.3 inches Bread Knife

Previous page Versatile and Reliable All-Purpose Cutting Tool From precision trimming to handling medium-sized ingredients, this is the go-to knife. For Precise Tasks Perfectly Peel and Trim This small knife is ideal for intricate tasks. Expert at peeling and trimming fruits and vegetables. Elevate Dining Experience Effortless Steakhouse-Quality Cuts Experience the razor-sharp blades of our 8pc steak knives for tender, flavorful bites. Versatile Culinary Tool Master Your Kitchen Chores From snipping herbs to opening packages, our Multifunctional Scissors are a must-have kitchen tool. Next page 1 4.8 inches Utility Knife 2 3.9 inches Paring Knife 3 4.5 inches Steak Knives 4 Multifunctional Scissors 5

Unmatched Strength & Elegance The titanium finish offers unrivaled strength, lightness, and corrosion resistance, elevating your culinary experience to new heights. Precision Crafted Blade The 30CR13 stainless steel blades deliver exceptional durability, sharpness, and precision for effortless cutting and long-lasting performance. Maximum Comfort & Control The ergonomic handle shape provides optimum comfort,secure grip and excellent maneuverability,ensuring a pleasurable and effortless cutting experience A Home Chef's Dream Each Home Hero knife is meticulously packaged, making it an ideal gift for cooking enthusiasts who appreciate quality and attention to detail.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great set of knives! Excellent Customer service!
reviews.reviewText: Update: I just had to revise my review from 4 to 5 stars as their customer service is AMAZING. They reached out to me to ask how I liked my product. I have them my honest review and explained that the base was cracked. They replied within 24hrs and sent a replacement that I received I. Just 2 days!They didn't ask for a return, they were kind and very professional.The new set is in perfect condition!Cons:1. I wanted to love the base of this knives set so much; however, the corner is cracked and the job fell off.2. Even when I put the knives as pictures I struggle with 2 of them to get them in and out. A bit frustrating.3. Washing is a delicate process. You have to make sure you dry them well or they will rust. (So not sure they are true stainless steel.PROS:1. These knives feel and look amazing.2. The knives are sharp! Making cooking easier.(Has sharpener as well)3. Omgoodness, the scissors work so well. Plus you can take it apart to clean it properly!4. WOW the peeler is NO Joke. It really takes the work out of peeling. It's sharp and you can peel in both directions!!!5. The base(even though it was cracked) really is beautiful and makes access so much simpler.6. The knives are full body, the handle is part of the actual knives. It has a smooth rubber-like coating for a better grip Which is amazing.7. The knives are a well built without feeling too heavy.So overall, still worth the price!If your looking for knives in a pinch, these seem like they will last a good long while. (So long as you DONT PUT THEM IN THE DISHWASHER OR LEAVE THEM IN THE SINK.)DRY THOROUGHLY AFTER EACH WASH GUYS. They will last a long time that way.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice product to buy
reviews.reviewText: I really like the style of the product.it was looking good on the kitchen counter top.Its a good product for people who like and enjoy chopping vegetables!!it has all kinds and all verities of knifes where you don’t think you will be missing something in it!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazingly sharp and high quality for the price
reviews.reviewText: I was shocked to find how sharp and high quality these knives are. Especially for the price.I really appreciate the various types of knives - small for vegetables, serrated for bread, ECT. It also comes with a blade sharpener. So far I've been really happy with my purchase and it's well worth the money

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Decent quality for the cost.
reviews.reviewText: I was very impressed with the set, and how well they cut. Only had these for almost 2 months. 1 of the knifes does have two small chunks on the blade missing, I have hand washed these, never in the dishwasher, so I’m not sure how or when it happened. Hoping to get in touch with seller to have this looked into. Will update if anything happens.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Awesome purchase, love all of the knives and it looks great too

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Rusting and Changing colors after hand wash
reviews.reviewText: Liked the set out the box the color was nice and knives were sharp. Had high hopes only to be disappointed, after the first couple hand washes the knives began to rust and get some discoloration on and around the blade and handle areas. Will be returning the set.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’ve had a lot of knives and at different price points and I must say that these are amazing. First of all the price point cannot be beat. For $10 these were a steal. Not to mention that these are some of the sharpest knives I’ve ever owned. They slice so clean and smooth. They look chic and modern and match my kitchen aesthetic. Unlike other reviewers, mine did come with the sharpener.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It's not difficult.
reviews.reviewText: I was excited to get this knife set it finally gets to my house I break open the box and sure enough the scissors are just some plastic white scissors it doesn't even have the marble look like it shows in the picture and the scrub brush is this ugly green that's not portrayed in the picture other than that it looks great I haven't really got to try them yet. I guess I just needed the ride to review as fast as possible because that annoys me so yeah just be careful you might not get everything you think you're going to get or the colors you really wanted. After trying the knives, they are very cheaply made, flimsy handles are plastic and feel like the knife blade and handle are ready to break in a matter of time, i used a steak knife 1 time and the tip has scratch marks on it. going to return this asap
Très bon couteau et paraît solide, a voir avec le temps
Super couteaux, sont jolis en plus
Ces couteaux sont vraiment top ! attention ils coupent !!!! idéal pour la viande !j'ai enfin trouvé des couteaux qui coupent sans effort !attention à vos doigts !
He tardado en hacer el comentario porque primero quería testarlos bien.Muy buenos estos cuchillos.Cortan mucho, son cómodos al asirlos y no se manchan en el lavavajillas!

reviews.reviewTitle: Ok solo per tagliare pietanze nel piatto.
reviews.reviewText: Non li ricomprerei perchè la qualità mi sembra buona e sono comodi e perfetti per tagliare pietanze nel piatto (carne, ecc...) ma è scomodo e diventa pericoloso (essendo anche molto affilati) usarli negli altri modi in cui si usano comunque i coltelli come per esempio sbucciare frutta, patate, ecc....
